title: Bonza
creator_credit: Bonza Productions, Film Victoria, Deborah Hoare and David Swann
brief_description: Bonza is quite possibly the funniest Australian short film ever! Being the confidante to an average suburban family is finally more than a dog can bear! “A gloriously silly climax” - top acting, brilliant script and direction make this a real little barker.
creator_credit_for_label: Bonza Productions, Film Victoria, Deborah Hoare and David Swann
